opis: Prodajemo dvojnu kuću lociranu u Matuljima. Kuća se sastoji od: Dva stana, svaki od 85 m2 + podrum, također 85m2 + visoko potkrovlje s mogućnošću uređenja u još jedan stan. Svaki stan je 2S+DB, kuhinja, blagavaonica i kupaona. 600 m2 uređene okućnice s pomoćnim objektima koje je moguće pretvoriti u stambeni prostor i prostrana garaža s kanalom. Nekretnina velikog potencijala stambeno poslovne namjene.-- Matulji su općina u Primorsko-goranskoj županiji. Dio Općine Matulji se nalazi u opatijskom zaleđu, dok se drugi dio nalazi na Ćićariji. Na području Općine Matulji nalaze se i dva cestovna granična prijelaza Rupa i Pasjak. Za vise info 095 829 1188 ili geofly.immobilien@gmail.com English: We are selling a semi-detached house located in Matulji. The house consists of: Two apartments, each of 85 m2 + basement, also 85m2 + high attic with the possibility of arranging into another apartment. Each apartment has 2 bedrooms + living room, kitchen, dining room and bathroom. 600 m2 landscaped garden with ancillary facilities that can be converted into living space and a spacious garage with a canal. Real estate of great potential for residential and business purposes. Matulji is a municipality in the Primorje-Gorski Kotar County. Part of the Municipality of Matulji is located in the hinterland of Opatija, while the other part is located in Ćićarija. There are also two road border crossings Rupa and Pasjak in the area of the Municipality of Matulji.
